resources.string: Selected contact(s) will be undeleted. Please confirm if you want to proceed?

This option will list the contacts that can be undeleted and depends on the manufacturer of your device or the Android version. Contacts cannot be recovered if the device does not allow it, contacts were deleted several hours ago or contacts were deleted from the SIM card.
This option is not valid for deleted contacts
Please select contact(s) and use the undelete icon in top-right to undelete them

We are sorry, no recoverable deleted contacts were found ! You can try to recover them using a manual way suggested by Google, the developers of Android. Will you like to visit the Google Support webpage which has manual recovery instructions ?
